ModMetaData.name: Letter Genes Regrow Finished
ModMetaData.author: Buggy
ModMetaData.description:
Send a letter when someone's genes have finished regrowing. It might conflict with any mod that modify XenogermReplicating def in HeDiffs_Various.xml file.
It can be safely added mid-game.
Options are: [list] [*]Show original message (uppper left corner of the screen). [*]Send letter. [*]Pause the game. [/list]
If you like this mod, maybe check out my other one: Permanent Injury Letter https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2592535960 Billed Deep Drill https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2593197871
It would be great to receive feedback, suggestions or pointers on how to improve.Hope these mods help!
Cheers!
